verses.roman:
jagat nistārite ei tomāra avatāra
bhakta-bhāva āge tāte kailā aṅgīkāra

synonyms: jagat nistārite—to deliver the whole world; ei—this; tomāra avatāra—Your incarnation; bhakta-bhāva—the mood of a devotee; āge—previously; tāte—therefore; kailā aṅgīkāra—You accepted;
translation: "My dear Lord, You have accepted the form of a devotee just to deliver all the fallen souls of this world.
